targets.query: SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."http_req_duration" WHERE ("testEnvironment"::tag =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest"::tag =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."http_req_duration" WHERE ("testEnvironment"::tag =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest"::tag =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."http_req_duration" WHERE ("testEnvironment"::tag =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest"::tag =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"::tag

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."http_req_duration" WHERE ("testEnvironment"::tag =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest"::tag =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"::tag

SELECT count("duration") FROM "30d"."http_req_duration" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
SELECT mean("percentiles99") FROM "gatling2" WHERE  "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "result" = 'ok' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT (CUMULATIVE_SUM(mean("failed"))  /  CUMULATIVE_SUM(mean("total")) ) * 100 FROM "30d"."k6-throughput"  WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter group by time(10s) fill(0)

SELECT count("duration") FROM "30d"."http_req_duration" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "error"::tag, "status"::tag

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."http_req_duration" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name", "status"::tag

SELECT mean("cq_mean_response_time") FROM "30d"."k6-http-percentiles" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT mean("cq_max_response_time") FROM "30d"."k6-http-percentiles" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT mean("cq_stddev_response_time") FROM "30d"."k6-http-percentiles" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT mean("cq_50pct_response_time") FROM "30d"."k6-http-percentiles" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT mean("cq_90pct_response_time") FROM "30d"."k6-http-percentiles" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT mean("cq_99pct_response_time") FROM "30d"."k6-http-percentiles" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "expected_response"::tag = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

list.definition: show tag values  from http_req_duration with key="systemUnderTest"
list.name: system_under_test
list.query: show tag values  from http_req_duration with key="systemUnderTest"

list.definition: show tag values from http_req_duration with key="testEnvironment" where "systemUnderTest" =~ /$system_under_test/
list.name: test_environment
list.query: show tag values from http_req_duration with key="testEnvironment" where "systemUnderTest" =~ /$system_under_test/
